snippet.title: Screening Interview Question: Why is UIViewController so Important?
snippet.description:
I'd like to go over a typical question I would give to screen candidates when hiring for junior iOS engineers.  Today we go over what a UIViewController is and why it's so important to use them inside of our applications.  Enjoy.

Instagram Firebase Course
